Text: You will be asked a question with the Likert Trial Type.
How often do you use social media?
Labels: Not very much | A Good Amount | Like, a lot

Text: The trial type can also change the the intervals of the options.
More specifically, how often do you use social media?
Labels: Not very much | Like, a lot

Text: You may also use words or letters instead of numbers.
What kinds of grades did you get last quarter?
